content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.Respond to parts a, b, and c.Describe one significant change in the relationship between Western Europe and other parts of the world after 1945.Explain one cause for a change in the relationship between Western Europe and other parts of the world after 1945.Describe one continuity in the economic relationship between Western Europe and other parts of the world in the period from the late 1800s through the late 1900s.

frqParts.text: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.Respond to parts a, b, and c.Describe one significant change in the relationship between Western Europe and other parts of the world after 1945.Explain one cause for a change in the relationship between Western Europe and other parts of the world after 1945.Describe one continuity in the economic relationship between Western Europe and other parts of the world in the period from the late 1800s through the late 1900s.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
